p: The mean size (=number of cormorants) of night roosts was negatively correlated to the total number of cormorants (Pearson's r = −0.896, p < 0.0019, R 2 80.2%) and above all to the number of night roosts (Pearson's r = −0.978, p < 0.0007, R 2 95.7%). However, it strongly increased between 1983 and 1989 and then strongly and regularly decreased afterwards (Figure 11).
